about.title: About Koinvote
about.introBold: Koinvote is a forum for Bitcoin holders, where opinions carry real and transparent influence according to their holdings.
about.intro: Through Koinvote, Bitcoin will evolve from an asset into a right. We believe that as Bitcoin adoption grows, this power will make an unparalleled contribution to human peace.
about.feature2: the Bitcoin related to your message signing never leaves your own address
about.feature3: all replies and holding information are publicly verifiable
about.feature4: earn potential returns by participating in events
about.outro: Through these features, we will provide a secure and effective platform to discover and deliver opinions from Bitcoin holders.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.notice: You may use koinvote.com without submitting any personal information, for example by using Tor or anti-chain-analysis services. If you are concerned about your personal information being collected on this platform, it is your responsibility to take protective measures.
privacy.s1_1_text: Used to verify balances and determine voting weight.
privacy.s1_2_text: Used to verify actions and ensure authenticity.
privacy.s1_3_text: Publicly displayed on the platform as part of events, accessible to all users for review and audit.
privacy.s1_5_text: Such as IP addresses, report counts, and device usage data, used to prevent abuse and maintain security.
privacy.s2_1: To ensure transparency, all successfully submitted Bitcoin addresses, signatures, plaintexts, and reply content will be publicly disclosed for audit purposes.
privacy.s2_2: Replies may be invalidated or reduced to zero weight before the event deadline by submitting a new signature or transferring funds, but previously submitted signatures and records will not be deleted.
privacy.s2_3: Payout reports will disclose winning addresses, prize distribution amounts, and verification files for independent user validation.
privacy.s3_intro: The platform will not share users' non-public information with third parties, unless:
privacy.s3_1: You have given explicit prior consent;
privacy.s4_1: The platform does not and will never require access to your private keys.
privacy.s4_2: While reasonable security measures are implemented, absolute security of data transmission and storage cannot be guaranteed.
privacy.s5_1: This policy may be updated from time to time and will be announced on the website.
privacy.s5_2: Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
